name: Ultimate Horse Racing:3d
description:
Now your best horse racing game Quest has been finished, Ultimate Horse Racing:3d game will provide you all desired pony riding and racing features, different horses, Arabian horse, Western horse, American Quarter horse breeds and many other world fastest running horses.

Hire your jockey to become the part of this simulation horse race, take care and train your pony for equestrian, You have to compete all variety of horse riders from a local and imported derby. Ultimate Horse Racing:3d is the ultimate pony race simulation and horse’s haven game, Real jockey horse beating, running and horse siting action animation, HD graphics, different stallion racing modes, addictive and user friendly gameplay and most intensive racing competition.

Race for the crown of championship, triple the horse racing roles, capture the photo and move to the finishing line to beat other horse and become the horse champion simulator. Ultimate Horse Racing:3d game has 3 different modes for fun that modes including; my race, championship, and multiplayer mode. My horse mode has 15 straight track intense competitions which you have to win for unlock next spsom horse racing mode. The second mode has 10 round track horse race that is more intense from first racing mode. All races are based on knock out system, you have to reach on 1st position to win race.

Get the experience of world most famous horse’s breed that has capability to win the race. Arabian horse breed, Thoroughbred, Marwari Horse, Morgan Horse, Clydesdale horse and American horses. But all horses are not available in the start of game, you should win the race and earn cash price and purchase fast horse racing breeds to win next intensive levels. Ultimate Horse Racing:3d is easy and thrilling simulator game, virtual horse, ses horse animation and physics.

Ultimate Horse Racing:3d Features:

Different 3D horses models with unique animations
HD graphics and audience crowd you think you are racing in VR
Exciting horse race and intensive competition
Very addictive and user friendly smooth horse control
Spectacular background music
Many horse stable
